Bases: object

create_call(project, call, from_name)¶
extract_call(call, from_name, settings)¶

Creates CallObject from call file (i.e. trigger-builds)

Returns a list of calls

get_calls(file_name)¶

Reads file by given name and returns CallObject array

get_calls_from_dict(file_dict, from_name, settings={})¶

Processes unfolded yaml object to CallObject array

settings is a dict of settings for keeping information like in what section we are right now (e.g. builders, publishers)

get_data_from_name(name)¶

Finds .yaml config by given name Slow version that will scan all files in the directory for each call

include_constructor(loader, node)¶
include_raw_constructor(loader, node)¶
reset()¶
unfold_yaml(file_name, is_root=False)¶

Unfolds file by given name

Also adds all included files as nodes to include graph. To disable this, set include_graph.active = False before calling
